fields_of_interest: Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Member of ESSF. Directive 33/2012/EC. The organisations is following work in the ESSF SG on Air Emissions and is Co Chair of the SG EGCS. The organisation was also a member of the ESSF SG PWRF.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: European Sustainable Shipping Forum (ESSF)#E02869#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2869#Not a member#C#Air Emissions from Ships
membership: EGCSA has links with Maritime Industry Associations such as ECSA, IACSEA, ICS, UKCS, ESPO, EUROSHORE, CESA. It has links with learned bodies such as IMarEST.
relevant_communication: Sampling programme of sea water and closed loop scrubbers. Revisions of IMO EGCS guidelines.
goals__remit:
•EGCSA was formed to protect and promote the interests of organizations and companies involved in the development of marine exhaust gas cleaning system technology and associated supporting technologies targeted at the reduction of emissions from prime movers in the maritime sector 
•EGCSA will develop and provide materials and information and facilitate training and knowledge promulgation to support the understanding and commercial & technical implications of the use of exhaust gas cleaning technology as a means to meet present and future emissions targets.
